website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight cream that visibly improves the look and feel of skin with natural ingredients.
pros: Features natural ingredients, including lotus flower extract, that moisturize and improve the look of your skin
Gives your skin a natural-looking glow
Absorbs quickly and helps improve the look of fine lines
cons: Might not be moisturizing enough for very dry skin

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes Without Feeling Greasy
customer_reviews.text: I'm not real big on "Fresh" products, but this one is a keeper! It keeps my face moisturized enough to help my make-up apply easier. I use it before bed too. Moisturizes without making 50+ year old skin feel greasy. It also doesn't leave any feeling of a residue, so within just a couple minutes I can apply make-up.

customer_reviews.title: A nice treat for my skin
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is so gentle and absorbs quickly into my skin without leaving any sticky residue. It has a subtle herbal/grassy smell which I don't really enjoy, but I prefer it to the overly perfumed moisturizers on the market. I apply this cream after I've used some rose water as toner (which is also extremely moisturizing for the skin), and together they make my skin so soft and supple, without clogging my pores. I bought the 0.5 ounce sample just to make sure I liked the product, but now I will be regularly buying the full size because I love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent and feeling !
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent! It is so refreshing. I even feel a slight tingle on my skin.. but, its nice. I do see an improvement of the texture of my skin. I gave it a 4 only because i wish the bottle was larger and the price was lower..

customer_reviews.text: This cream is amazing. Im only 23, but I like to take care of my skin so I decided to try this out. I am beyond impressed. It makes my skin look fresh, hydrated, and smoothe! I love it. Regardless of your age, if you’re looking for a cream that hydrates and makes your skin look flawless, use this one!

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lotion and WHY!
customer_reviews.text: This is my must have moisturizer in my night and day time skin care regime. I am IN LOVE with this moisturizer because: 1. It leaves my face feeling refresh and my skin hydrated 2. My skin absorbs the lotion nicely 3. After a week of use (day and night), I noticed smoother skin. 4. It is not greasy at all 5. It smells like what you would imagine a lotus flower smells like (AMAZING) and it is not overpowering/too strong at all. I will be repurchasing this lotion. Well done Fresh!
